Sql.CDATA: IF EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM SYS.views WHERE name = 'v_EmployeeHolidaySehedule' AND SCHEMA_ID = SCHEMA_ID('dbo') ) DROP VIEW [dbo].[v_EmployeeHolidaySehedule] GO CREATE VIEW v_EmployeeHolidaySehedule AS SELECT r.CompanyID, 'LEAVE' AS CATAGORY, r.RefNbr, r.LeaveType AS Type, r.RequestEmployeeID, r.RequestDate, r.LeaveStart AS StartDate, r.LeaveEnd AS EndDate, r.Duration FROM LumLeaveRequest r WHERE r.Status = 'A'
